mcq.statement: After the reading lesson women's role in the Pakistan movement. It is inferred that the role of women expended because of _____?

options.a: Quaid-e-Azam who stressed the importance of women as equal partner of men in the struggle for a separate homeland
options.b: Fatima Jinnah participation in all the activities of Quaid-e-Azam
options.c: Bi Amma Speeches to Khilafat gatherings
